name: The bloodstorm crypt
description: You've been trapped in the crypt for a week now ever since you were trapped off from the rest of your crew. You were dispatched here to contain a alleged demon infestation of a crypt. You've been trying to contact UAC, but to no avail. It looks like they've left you for dead... Will you crawl your way out alive? Or let the darkness consume you? This is truly the hardest test you'll ever go through in your life...
